official_title: To suspend for a 3-year period the duty on C.I. Pigment Yellow 155.

summary.text: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, for a three year period,the duty on 1,4-benzenedicarboxylic acid, 2,2'(1,4- phenylene-bis (imino(1-acetyl-2-oxo-2,1- ethanediyl)-azo)) bis-,tetramethyl ester (also known as C.I. pigment yellow 155).

titles.title: To suspend for a 3-year period the duty on C.I. Pigment Yellow 155.
